titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to establish a pilot program for commercial recreation concessions on certain land managed by the Bureau of Land Management.
RPPA Commercial Recreation Concessions Pilot Program Act of 2015
RPPA Commercial Recreation Concessions Pilot Program Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 114-509.

bill.summary:
RPPA Commercial Recreation Concessions Pilot Program Act of 2015
This bill amends the Recreation and Public Purposes Act to direct the Department of the Interior to establish a pilot program that authorizes commercial recreation concessions on land patented or leased under the Act.
Interior shall enter into at least 10 agreements with parties to whom such land has been patented or leased for the establishment of these concessions.
A party to such an agreement may enter into agreements with third parties to establish such concessions.
